paper_abstract: In this paper we find that the two-round (extended) Lai-Massey scheme is not pseudorandom and three-round (extended) Lai-Massey scheme is not strong pseudorandom. Combined with previous work, we prove that three rounds are necessary and sufficient for the pseudorandomness and four rounds are necessary and sufficient for the strong pseudorandomness. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Pseudorandomness analysis of the (extended) Lai-Massey scheme
